edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.globalworkspace
Interface Coalition

All Superinterfaces:
Activatible, Initializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CoalitionImpl
public interface Coalition
extends Activatible

An encapsulation of perceptual content and an AttentionCodelet Coalition objects are created and added to the GlobalWorkspace by AttentionCodelet objects. Coalition must overwrite correctly Object.equals(Object) and Object.hashCode() methods.

Author:
Javier Snaider, Ryan J. McCall
